steps: step 2: Click on link TestSuites -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites/*'
step 3: Click on link testSuiteDetails (CPACPreapprovalTestSuite) -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/executions/*'
step 4: Click on link TestResults3 -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/executions/*/test-runs'
step 6: Click on button GoToTestResultDetails -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/executions/*'
step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
